title: Peruvian quinoa orange cake
ingredients: ['150g white quinoa', '1 pinch salt', '200g dairy-free spread', '200g caster sugar', '3 large eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g ground almonds', '1 teaspoon gluten-free baking powder', '2 oranges', 'For the topping', '100g clear honey', '30g blanched almonds', 'mint sprigs, to decorate', 'dairy-free yoghurt, to serve']
